triples.name: Cultural retention
triples.relevance: The paper examines how populations maintain or lose cultural practices across generations.

triples.name: Tradition
triples.relevance: The paper investigates the importance placed on maintaining tradition as a function of environmental stability.

triples.name: Evolutionary anthropology
triples.relevance: The paper extends models from evolutionary anthropology to explain cultural persistence through environmental variability.

triples.name: Cultural evolution
triples.relevance: The paper examines how cultural traits and practices change or persist over time based on environmental conditions.

triples.name: Climate variability and change
triples.relevance: The paper proposes measuring climatic variability across generations as an empirical test of cultural persistence hypotheses.
